## Neovim keymap (generated by `GenerateKeymapDocs` command)

| mode |     lhs      |                                  rhs                                  |                          desc                          |
|------|--------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| `n`  | `<Esc><Esc>` | ` :nohlsearch<CR> `                                                   | Clear search highlight                                 |
| `x`  | `#`          | ` y?\V<C-R>"<CR> `                                                    | Nvim builtin                                           |
| `o`  | `%`          | ` <Plug>(MatchitOperationForward) `                                   |                                                        |
| `x`  | `%`          | ` <Plug>(MatchitVisualForward) `                                      |                                                        |
| `n`  | `%`          | ` <Plug>(MatchitNormalForward) `                                      |                                                        |
| `n`  | `&`          | ` :&&<CR> `                                                           | Nvim builtin                                           |
| `x`  | `*`          | ` y/\V<C-R>"<CR> `                                                    | Nvim builtin                                           |
| `n`  | `,S`         |                                                                       | Toggle spell check                                     |
| `n`  | `,rn`        |                                                                       | Rename                                                 |
| `n`  | `,0`         | ` :tablast<CR> `                                                      | Goto last tab                                          |
| `n`  | `,9`         | ` 9gt `                                                               | Goto 9th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,8`         | ` 8gt `                                                               | Goto 8th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,7`         | ` 7gt `                                                               | Goto 7th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,6`         | ` 6gt `                                                               | Goto 6th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,5`         | ` 5gt `                                                               | Goto 5th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,4`         | ` 4gt `                                                               | Goto 4th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,3`         | ` 3gt `                                                               | Goto 3th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,2`         | ` 2gt `                                                               | Goto 2th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,1`         | ` 1gt `                                                               | Goto 1th tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,mT`        | ` :tabm -1<CR> `                                                      | Move tab to left                                       |
| `n`  | `,mt`        | ` :tabm +1<CR> `                                                      | Move tab to right                                      |
| `n`  | `,l`         |                                                                       | Toggle cursor lock                                     |
| `n`  | `,V`         |                                                                       | Toggle LSP symbols outline tree                        |
| `n`  | `,W`         | ` :Gw!<CR> `                                                          | Select the current buffer when resolving git conflicts |
| `n`  | `,B`         | ` :Git blame<CR> `                                                    | Git blame                                              |
| `n`  | `,H`         |                                                                       | FZF git_commits                                        |
| `n`  | `,G`         |                                                                       | FZF git_bcommits                                       |
| `n`  | `,F`         |                                                                       | FZF lsp_live_workspace_symbols                         |
| `n`  | `,f`         |                                                                       | FZF lsp_document_symbols                               |
| `n`  | `,T`         |                                                                       | FZF tags                                               |
| `n`  | `,o`         |                                                                       | FZF files                                              |
| `n`  | `,a`         |                                                                       | FZF grep_project                                       |
| `n`  | `,g`         |                                                                       | FZF live_grep                                          |
| `n`  | `,b`         |                                                                       | FZF buffers                                            |
| `n`  | `,/`         |                                                                       | FZF commands                                           |
| `n`  | `,p`         |                                                                       | FZF builtin                                            |
| `n`  | `,w`         | ` :set wrap!<CR> `                                                    | Toggle word wrap                                       |
| `n`  | `,u`         | ``` gg=G`` ```                                                        | Indent buffer                                          |
| `n`  | `,k`         | ` :bprev<CR> `                                                        | Switch to previous buffer                              |
| `n`  | `,j`         | ` :bnext<CR> `                                                        | Switch to next buffer                                  |
| `n`  | `,e`         | ` :Tex<CR> `                                                          | Open file browser in new tab                           |
| `n`  | `,t`         | ` :tabnew<CR> `                                                       | Open new tab                                           |
| `n`  | `,s`         | ` :new<CR> `                                                          | Open new window to bottom                              |
| `n`  | `,v`         | ` :vnew<CR> `                                                         | Open new window to right                               |
| `n`  | `,,`         | ` :let $curdir=expand('%:p:h')<CR>:vsplit<CR>:ter<CR>cd $curdir<CR> ` | Open new terminal window to right                      |
| `n`  | `,.`         | ` : `                                                                 | Command mode                                           |
| `n`  | `K`          |                                                                       | Hover documentation                                    |
| `v`  | `Y`          | ` "+y<CR> `                                                           | Big yank (system clipboard)                            |
| `n`  | `Y`          | ` y$ `                                                                | Nvim builtin                                           |
| `o`  | `[%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitOperationMultiBackward) `                             |                                                        |
| `x`  | `[%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitVisualMultiBackward) `                                |                                                        |
| `n`  | `[%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitNormalMultiBackward) `                                |                                                        |
| `o`  | `]%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitOperationMultiForward) `                              |                                                        |
| `x`  | `]%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitVisualMultiForward) `                                 |                                                        |
| `n`  | `]%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitNormalMultiForward) `                                 |                                                        |
| `x`  | `a%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitVisualTextObject) `                                   |                                                        |
| `x`  | `gx`         | ` <Plug>NetrwBrowseXVis `                                             |                                                        |
| `n`  | `gx`         | ` <Plug>NetrwBrowseX `                                                |                                                        |
| `o`  | `g%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitOperationBackward) `                                  |                                                        |
| `x`  | `g%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitVisualBackward) `                                     |                                                        |
| `n`  | `g%`         | ` <Plug>(MatchitNormalBackward) `                                     |                                                        |
| `n`  | `gcA`        |                                                                       | Comment insert end of line                             |
| `n`  | `gcO`        |                                                                       | Comment insert above                                   |
| `n`  | `gco`        |                                                                       | Comment insert below                                   |
| `x`  | `gb`         | ` <Plug>(comment_toggle_blockwise_visual) `                           | Comment toggle blockwise (visual)                      |
| `x`  | `gc`         | ` <Plug>(comment_toggle_linewise_visual) `                            | Comment toggle linewise (visual)                       |
| `n`  | `gbc`        |                                                                       | Comment toggle current block                           |
| `n`  | `gcc`        |                                                                       | Comment toggle current line                            |
| `n`  | `gb`         | ` <Plug>(comment_toggle_blockwise) `                                  | Comment toggle blockwise                               |
| `n`  | `gc`         | ` <Plug>(comment_toggle_linewise) `                                   | Comment toggle linewise                                |
| `n`  | `gr`         |                                                                       | Show references                                        |
| `n`  | `gD`         |                                                                       | Show implementations                                   |
| `n`  | `ga`         |                                                                       | Code action                                            |
| `n`  | `gd`         |                                                                       | Goto definition                                        |
| `n`  | `gk`         |                                                                       | Goto prev diagnostic                                   |
| `n`  | `gj`         |                                                                       | Goto next diagnostic                                   |
| `n`  | `qq`         |                                                                       | Kill buffer                                            |
| `n`  | `tt`         | ` :let $curdir=expand('%:p:h')<CR>:tabnew<CR>:ter<CR>cd $curdir<CR> ` | Open new terminal tab                                  |
| `n`  | `y<C-G>`     | ` :<C-U>call setreg(v:register, fugitive#Object(@%))<CR> `            |                                                        |
| `x`  | `<M-i>`      |                                                                       |                                                        |
| `o`  | `<M-i>`      |                                                                       |                                                        |
| `n`  | `<M-p>`      |                                                                       | Move to previous reference                             |
| `n`  | `<M-n>`      |                                                                       | Move to next reference                                 |
| `n`  | `<C-K>`      | ` <C-W>k `                                                            | Move to upper window                                   |
| `n`  | `<C-J>`      | ` <C-W>j `                                                            | Move to bottom window                                  |
| `n`  | `<C-H>`      | ` <C-W>h `                                                            | Move to left window                                    |
| `n`  | `<C-L>`      | ` <C-W>l `                                                            | Move to right window                                   |
